FuncDef:
The te-link command configures a TE-link for an LMP neighbor.
The undo te-link command deletes a TE-link configured for an LMP neighbor.
By default, no TE-link is configured for an LMP neighbor.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of a TE-link.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 1024.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The device only supports static LMP. Static LMP can discover a TE-link and data-links between LMP neighbors only after the TE-link and data-links are configured.
Prerequisites
Static LMP has been enabled using the lmp static command.
